Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Françoise Aline Schneider at a golf tournament in Zürich. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Françoise Aline Schneider is a 49 year old Senior Designer from Switzerland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Françoise Aline Schneider and Gasser have been married since 2005. Their children are named Barbara and Annina.
Education Background:
Françoise completed her secondary education at Liceo scientifico Giovanni Polli Lugano in 1993.
In 1998, Françoise graduated from Franklin University Switzerland with a degree.
Occupation History:
Françoise Aline Schneider is a 49 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Françoise Aline Schneider's first role was as a Assistant Designer at Akris AG, where she worked diligently from 1999 to 2000 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Senior Designer at Akris AG in 2000, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 600000 CHF, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has house located in Neuchatel, worth 2720000 CHF.

She inherited 870000 CHF from her father, a well-known Venture Capitalist, in 2013, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Françoise as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
